description:
Using fluorescence flow cytometry data for single-cell gene expression analysis in bacteria.

vngFCM is a package designed to analyse fluocytometry data of small bacterial cells.

Fluocytometer analysis of bacterial cells.

install.packages("/path/to/E-Flow", repos=NULL, type="source").

This package has been designed to process FCM data by removing non viable cells, subtracting autofluorescence and reduce the effect of electronic noise coming from the cytometer. It has been designed for the analysis of bacterial cells, where the small dimensions and the low expression pose challanges in the correct interpretation of the data.

As for any R package, just download the source folder and install it using the command
name: E-Flow
